name: PISTOLA
description:
Kill as many enemies as you can and try to get a good position on the online leaderboard.

  • 10+ different upgrades to automate your character
  • 20+ different enemies that really wants to kill you
  • 20+ different upgrades to make your own unique build

PISTOLA is a roguelike top-down shooter where you can buy upgrades to make your pistol stronger.

KILL A LOT OF ENEMIES

BUY UPGRADES ON THE MERCHANT

ENTER THE GLOBAL LEADERBOARD
